name: LittleWasher
description:
Caution game in Russian. Unfortunately, we did not manage to translate into English. But game is easy to learn, so you can play without translate. We will try to lay out a patch with localization.  Made in Indicator Jam. 

Control swipe like mobile games.

Please report bugs. Enjoy!

Gamedesigner, Develope - Oleg Pavlovski
Gamedesigner - Yulia Karunova
Character artist - Maria Budasova;  instagram: @furraran
